Package org.eclipse.ptp.debug.core.pdi.manager

Interface IPDIVariableManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IPDIManager, IPDISessionObject, IPDISet
    public interface IPDIVariableManager
extends IPDIManager
    Represent expression manager to manage processes
